When unauthorized changes or unexpected levels of system performance are indicated.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Configuration Management">3887b9fcdb211010280df36f299619b6</control_family> <control_name>Review System Changes</control_name> <control_number>CM-05(02)</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory Enhancement</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>CM-05</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards>High:  Std.1 - The system configuration must be continuously monitored as a supplemental information source for the review processes. Std.2 - Information system changes must be verified to meet syst</implementation_standards> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>false</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>false</moderate> <number>ARSC0010926</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:23</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>3</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>NIST SP: 800-37, 800-100</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>AU-6, AU-7, CM-3, CM-5, PE-6, PE-8</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Indications that warrant review of information system changes and the specific circumstances justifying such reviews may be obtained from activities carried out by organizations during the configuration change process.The results of the review include evidence of control effectiveness and recommendations for correcting any deficiencies are documented.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>7887b9fcdb211010280df36f299619db</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:23</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
